name: George the Wombat
description:
Play as the main protagonist, George the Wombat as he struggles to find and discover the truth behind the twisted facility he works at.

-- Disclaimer --

 Please take note that "George the Wombat" probably won't become a full fledge game, we're hoping to have actual levels, battles & bosses, and more of the plot revealed later. This game is still a W.I.P. but we're hoping we can get more of this finished if there's ever a Scratch Game Jam #3!

-- Controls --

Basic controls, use arrow keys to move. Expect more abilities & moves to come in when the battle update comes.
